main event: Witnesses reported observing a diamond shaped object, the size of a baseball, flying southwest for 15 minutes in Macon, Georgia.
interesting points: The object was described as diamond shaped and white, with red lights in the lower corners., The sighting duration was noted to be 15 minutes., Object was traveling at a significant altitude of approximately 75,000 feet and an estimated speed of 500 knots., Observers included multiple individuals from differing occupations., Comments indicated that the description, duration, and flight path suggested it was probably an aircraft.
witness description: Witnesses included a physical therapist, a cashier, a mechanic, and a housewife.
